page.title: 03GRAVEL PITS OLD AND NEW.
page.content: Gravel has been extracted from large areas,leaving pits filled with water.Some a natural habitat for nature.Other pits are in the process of being filled with refuse from local authority .Most of the rubbish dumped is local household refuse,but a section is provided for people who wish to take their own rubbish,unwanted furniture and other items.The dump also includes a bottle bank where they can be re-cycled.The depots were originally at Marshfoot and Baker Street,but the areas became so untidy that they were transferred to the old gravel pits.
